definition: to belong to/affiliated to/to result in sth/to incline towards

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
to die in such a way that sb (or sth) else also perishes/to take sb down with oneself/to end in mutual destruction
to become reconciled/to bury the hatchet

sentences.english: Such as that which is complete comes, that the limited shall come to nought.
sentences.chinese: 等那完全的來到，這有限的必歸於無有了。

sentences.english: Birds resort unto their like: so truth will return to them that practise her.
sentences.chinese: 鳥獸與同類相聚，真理也必歸於實行真理的人。

sentences.english: He ascribes his success to skill or exert stay.
sentences.chinese: 他把他的勝利歸於技能和努力的任務。

sentences.english: He decided to square himself with his wife after their quarrel.
sentences.chinese: 爭吵之後，他決定與他的妻子言歸於好。

sentences.english: We are moving to replace mutually assured destruction with mutual cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在採取行動，以共同合作代替同歸於盡。

sentences.english: The woodlands have hushed their songs, and doors are all shut at every house.
sentences.chinese: 林地裏，歌聲歸於沉寂，家家戶戶都關門了。

sentences.english: Glory to God in highest and peace to the humans of good will on the earth.
sentences.chinese: 榮耀歸於至高的上主，和平歸於地下的良民。

sentences.english: Glory to God in highest and peace to the humans of good will on the earth.
sentences.chinese: 榮耀歸於至高的上主，和平歸於地下的良民。

sentences.english: Remember, I beseech thee, that thou hast made me as the clay; and wilt thou bring me into dust again?
sentences.chinese: 求你記念製造我如摶泥一般，你還要使我歸於塵土嗎？

sentences.english: The blame for this accident attaches to the man who destroyed the signal.
sentences.chinese: 這個事故的責任歸於那個破壞信號的人。

sentences.english: He even reconciled with a classmate with whom he had had trouble several years ago.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至和一位積怨多年的同學言歸於好。

sentences.english: They quarrelled but now they're completely reconciled.
sentences.chinese: 他們爭吵過，但現在已經完全言歸於好了。

sentences.english: In both cases, the remainder would go to the book's publishers.
sentences.chinese: 在這兩種情況下，其餘的份額將歸於圖書的出版商。

sentences.english: Miguel:I think a good friendship deserves a second chance.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲深厚的友情應該有言歸於好的機會。

sentences.english: The two boys agreed to let bygones be bygones and made friends again.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個男孩同意不計較過去，而且重歸於好了。

sentences.english: Is it possible to make peace with the dead?
sentences.chinese: 有可能與死者重歸於好嗎？
